name: Diglett
flavorText:
Lives about one
yard underground
where it feeds on plant roots. It
sometimes appears
above ground.

previous.name: Venomoth
previous.flavorText:
The dustlike scales covering its wings
are color-coded to indicate the kinds of
poison it has.

next.name: Dugtrio
next.flavorText:
A team of DIGLETT
triplets.
It triggers huge earthquakes by
burrowing 60 miles
underground.
